name: Super Turbo Arcade 3000
description:
What if you suddendly got inside of your favorite arcade machine... Literally 

#indiesvsgamers

CONTROLS:

X: Select         A / S  / D /  W: Move

UP_Arrow / Down_Arrow / Left_Arrow/ Rigth_Arrow : Shot
